executable.title: Image Metric Explorer
executable.description: Explores Mean Squared Error and Mutual Information metrics for HW10
executable.acknowledgements: This work is based on lecture notes for the class Multi-Dimensional Image Analysis Tools and Techniques taught by Professor Hans Johnson at the University of Iowa.
